source.name: Function Comprehension
source.instructions: What is the role of `//clear//` in the given playground?

answers.answer: To clear the content of the text file
To clear the errors being generated

source.guidance: In the given playground, `//clear//` is used as a keyword. When the Python code sees this keyword in the text file, it triggers a function that clears the content of the text file. This can be helpful to quickly clean up the content of the file for the next operation.
